goal.ch: 本課程是為上學期學過30小時聽說華語課程的學生所設計的，旨在培養和積累現代標準華語的基本交際能力。在課程中，學生將發展其聽、說、讀和寫（打）四方面的技能。然而，本課程的重點將是培養學生的口語和聽力技巧的交際能力。以口語和聽力帶動閱讀和寫作。學生將能夠在特定情況下用華語與他人口頭交流。
goal.en: This course is designed for the students, who have had studied Mandarin Chinese for 30 hours in the prior semester, to develop and accumulate the basic communication skills in the Modern Standard Chinese. Throughout the course, students will develop their listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. However, the emphasis in this course will be on building up students’ communicative competence in oral and aural skills. Reading and writing will be minimally introduced along with speaking and listening skills. Students will be able to communicate verbally in Chinese language within given situations.
